required_fields.contact_email: Email liên hệ để nhận tài khoản + mật khẩu

sql_query_examples.get_all_rewards: SELECT * FROM reward_requests WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
sql_query_examples.get_gemini_only: SELECT * FROM reward_requests WHERE reward_type = 'gemini' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
sql_query_examples.get_cash_only: SELECT * FROM reward_requests WHERE reward_type = 'cash' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
sql_query_examples.get_by_status: SELECT * FROM reward_requests WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
sql_query_examples.count_by_type: SELECT reward_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM reward_requests GROUP BY reward_type;
sql_query_examples.count_by_status: SELECT status, COUNT(*) as count FROM reward_requests GROUP BY status;

notes.reward_details: Stored as JSON string. Use JSON.parse() to convert to object in JavaScript
notes.cash_visibility: Cash reward is ONLY visible for Vietnamese language (hidden from English)
notes.language_detection: Use getVisibleRewardTypes(language) function to get available rewards for language
notes.flexible_structure: Each reward type has different fields. Use reward_manager.js to handle this
